model.text1: This technology uses AI to estimate the positions of joints and major points (neck, shoulders, elbows, wrists, ankles, etc.) of a person or object and their connections from images.
model.text2: By utilizing deep-running models, it can estimate the position and posture of objects with high accuracy.

item1.title: Sports Analysis
item1.text: Using it in sports such as soccer, basketball, figure skating, etc., it helps analyze the movements of athletes. This can improve training plans or tactics.

item2.title: Motion captur
item2.text: It can improve animation as well as virtual reality experiences by capturing character movements in real-time in film or game production.

imageNR.text: AI technology that reduces high-ISO noise caused by low-light shooting to achieve high image quality.

videoNR.text: Real-time, high-quality image enhancement by AI even in video recording where long-second exposures are difficult to use

superResolution.text: AI technology to enhance low-resolution digital images while preserving sharpness

deblurring.text: AI technology to reduce blur caused by camera shaking or shooting moving subjects

deraining.text: AI technology to remove water drops on the surface of the camera lens from the image after shooting

objectDetection.text: AI technology to detect where people, vehicles, and other objects are located in an image

segmentation.text: AI technology to divide colors by object areas

poseEstimation.text: AI technology to estimate the position of human joints and major points (neck, shoulders, elbows, wrists, ankles, etc.) and their connections

classification.text: AI technology to recognize objects in images and classify them
